New Records: Rassie van der Dussen scored 133 runs, the highest score by a South African player in this match.
Key Match Events: South Africa achieved their highest score in the match with 357/4.
New Zealand lost key players early, contributing to their low total of 167.
Rassie van der Dussen's century was the highest individual score in the match.
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand won the toss and elected to field first.
South Africa's batting order included several key players aiming to capitalize on the powerplay.
Post-Match Reflections: Rassie van der Dussen was named Player of the Match for his outstanding performance.
South Africa's win provided a significant boost in confidence ahead of the World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Pune.
The crowd attendance was 31,914, showing strong support for the game.
